dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: People think these big environmental campaigns are just for show, but actually, President Tokayev just planted a tree himself in Astana's Zhastar City Park.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: People think these big environmental campaigns are just for show, but actually, President Tokayev just planted a tree himself in Astana's Zhastar City Park.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: As part of the Taza Kazakhstan eco-festival, President Tokayev, together with environmental activists, planted a tree in the Zhastar City Park in Astana.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, and it was part of that Taza Kazakhstan eco-festival, right? He was out there with environmental volunteers.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, and it was part of that Taza Kazakhstan eco-festival, right? He was out there with environmental volunteers.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: As part of the Taza Kazakhstan eco-festival, President Tokayev, together with environmental activists, planted a tree in the Zhastar City Park in Astana.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly. And get this—over the past three days, they planted nearly 4.5 million seedlings across the whole country.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly. And get this-over the past three days, they planted nearly four point five million seedlings across the whole country.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In total, nearly 4.5 million seedlings have been planted across all regions of the country over the past three days during the nationwide campaign Kazakhstan-wide Tree Planting Day, contributing to the country's forest resources.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Wow, that's a massive number. It's not just symbolic; it's actually contributing to forest resources.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wow, that's a massive number. It's not just symbolic; it's actually contributing to forest resources.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In total, nearly 4.5 million seedlings have been planted across all regions of the country over the past three days during the nationwide campaign Kazakhstan-wide Tree Planting Day, contributing to the country's forest resources.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: And he's been pushing this since March, when he spoke at the National Kurultai in Burabay. He said it shouldn't be a one-off thing.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And he's been pushing this since March, when he spoke at the National Kurultai in Burabay. He said it shouldn't be a one-off thing.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In March of this year, speaking at a session of the National Kurultai in Burabay, the President emphasized that Kazakh citizens should always pay attention to maintaining cleanliness and order. According to Tokayev, Taza Kazakhstan is not a temporary initiative but a project that should continue year-round.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Right, he wants Taza Kazakhstan to become a daily habit for everyone, not just a temporary campaign.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right, he wants Taza Kazakhstan to become a daily habit for everyone, not just a temporary campaign.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: As I've said before, ˜Taza Kazakhstan' is not just a campaign; it should become a daily way of life for every citizen and for our entire nation, the Head of State previously stated. According to Tokayev, Taza Kazakhstan is not a temporary initiative but a project that should continue year-round.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Which is smart, 'cause you know, sometimes these initiatives lose steam after the photo ops.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Which is smart, 'cause you know, sometimes these initiatives lose steam after the photo ops.

dialogue_turns.text: For sure. But if it's embedded in the culture, it could have a real lasting impact.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: For sure. But if it's embedded in the culture, it could have a real lasting impact.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: He called it a "way of life," which is a pretty strong framing. Makes you think it's about more than just planting trees.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: He called it a way of life, which is a pretty strong framing. Makes you think it's about more than just planting trees.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, like overall cleanliness and civic responsibility. I mean, he mentioned cleanup days and people tidying up their neighborhoods as things are warming up.

dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: It's getting warmer outside, and people are organizing cleanup days and tidying up their surroundings " this is a very important cause.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: And it's been running nationwide since 2024, so it's already got some traction. Public support seems strong.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And it's been running nationwide since twenty twenty four, so it's already got some traction. Public support seems strong.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Do you think it'll actually change how people behave long-term, though?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Do you think it'll actually change how people behave long-term, though?

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Well, if leaders are participating and keeping it in the spotlight, maybe. Consistency is key.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: True. And linking it to something bigger, like national identity or pride, could help.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: True. And linking it to something bigger, like national identity or pride, could help.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Definitely. Instead of just a government project, it becomes everyone's project.

dialogue_turns.text: Let's see if it sticks beyond the seasonal push.
